thread.title: New Miami is ordered to repay $3M from speeding tickets | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: New Miami is ordered to repay $3M from speeding tickets | Daily Mail Online

author: Associated Press
title: New Miami is ordered to repay $3M from speeding tickets | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Ohio village is ordered to repay $3MILLION to drivers caught speeding by automated traffic cameras A village must pay back all $3million paid by drivers for speeding citations from automated traffic cameras, a judge in Ohio says Butler County Judge Michael Oster issued his ruling Wednesday, saying the money was unjust enrichment of New Miami Judge ruled in 2014 that the village's camera enforcement was unconstitutional The ruling is the latest round in appeals and disputes in the case, and the village has said it will continue to challenge the rule Published: 05:12 GMT, 9 February 2017 | Updated: 03:58 GMT, 10 February 2017 34 shares
